title: OptimHire Does the Unbelievable - Reduces Tech Hiring Time From 6 Months To Just 12 Days - Business Wire
content: OptimHire Does the Unbelievable - Reduces Tech Hiring Time From 6 Months To Just 12 Days  Business Wire
description: OptimHire, a San Francisco-based global tech recruiting firm, aims to be a power player by disrupting the USD 31 billion tech recruiting industry.
